# Python Cheat Sheet

## GIT HUB
0. git clone 
1. git add .
2. git commit -m "message stating what it is that has been changed"
3. git push (origin main)

## Conditionals 
for x in list_name:
    if x > 0:
        print("this return is positive and is" + x)
    elif x <= 0:
        print("this return is negative and is " + x)
